section.title: os_timer_def Struct Reference

listitem.para: start address of a timer function

section.section:
Detailed Description
Timer Definition structure contains timer parameters. Note
CAN BE CHANGED: os_timer_def is implementation specific in every CMSIS-RTOS.
The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file: Middlewares/Third_Party/FreeRTOS/Source/CMSIS_RTOS/cmsis_os.h
